version_description:
- shooting accuracy with any kinds of weapons corrected - joy to all shotgun lovers!
- general game productivity increased.
- the option to choose the difficulty level in the beginning of “Campaign” mode added.
- new type of control for the beginners.
- first mission edited, tutorial added.
- camera improved, now the gamer is always in the center of the screen.
- many minor bugs fixed.

- All levels in Campaign mode available, no restrictions!
- Stability of flamethrower weapon corrected
- Error with in-game music after restore fixed
- Other minor bugs fixed

- Now you can resupply ammo and equipment use special stores right on the battle field!
- Possibility to earn MORE COINS for FREE!
- Many minor bugs fixed.

- General game productivity increased
- Camera moves smother

- incorrect representation of the game on iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6+ fixed.
- minor bugs fixed.

Total update of the legendary game with new levels, weapons, monsters and many other innovations including :
- ability of character skills' development
- battle drones, grenades, medkits, implants and many other useful gadgets.
- new types of armory, helmets and boots.
- leader-boards and achievements.
- new types of additional missions.
- totally altered interface.

Attention! All in-app purchases will be automatically restored. If not, please, write on support@sigma-team.net and we will solve all the problems.

- leaderboads fixed
- minor changes and improvements

Attention!
High command of planet Earth began total modification of current armament system in order to fight the alien monsters more effectively.
All the plants started production of new generation weapons, many of them equipped with unique modules providing useful features to increase the chance to win.
Special containers with all necessary equipment were introduced to speed up new weapon delivery.

- added joystick support
- increased frame rate in the menus
- stability improvements
